sense.def:
To accompany someone
pomeni nekam iti s tistim človekom.

seg.quote: She asked me to accompany her to the church.

sense.def:
Če ena stvar
accompanies another
, se obe dogajata ali obstajata hkrati.

seg.quote: A high fever often accompanies a mild infection.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REFL VB

sense.def:
To accompany a singer or a musician
pomeni, da igramo spremljevalni del skladbe, medtem ko pevec ali glasbenik izvaja glavno melodijo.
